Every day our faith should increase. While we say, "I know that I am a sinner," we can say also, "I know I have a Saviour." Jesus died for sinners, and He will pardon my sins, if I sincerely repent. It is of no avail to 


                                    -124- 

claim to believe on Christ unless we acknowledge the claims of God's law and daily strive to obey its precepts.--Ms 25, 1886, p. 2. ("Sanctification," sermon, June 20, 1886.)
